00036 #ifndef __btkLinearInterpolateImageFunctionWithWeights_h
00037 #define __btkLinearInterpolateImageFunctionWithWeights_h
00038 
00039 // First make sure that the configuration is available.
00040 // This line can be removed once the optimized versions
00041 // gets integrated into the main directories.
00042 #include "itkConfigure.h"
00043 
00044 #include "itkInterpolateImageFunction.h"
00045 
00046 namespace btk
00047 {
00048 
00049 using namespace itk;
00050 
00068 template <class TInputImage, class TCoordRep = double>
00069 class LinearInterpolateImageFunctionWithWeights :
00070   public InterpolateImageFunction<TInputImage,TCoordRep>
00071 {
00072 public:
00074   typedef LinearInterpolateImageFunctionWithWeights                  Self;
00075   typedef InterpolateImageFunction<TInputImage,TCoordRep> Superclass;
00076   typedef SmartPointer<Self>                              Pointer;
00077   typedef SmartPointer<const Self>                        ConstPointer;
00078 
00080   itkTypeMacro(LinearInterpolateImageFunctionWithWeights, InterpolateImageFunction);
00081 
00083   itkNewMacro(Self);
00084 
00086   typedef typename Superclass::OutputType OutputType;
00087 
00089   typedef typename Superclass::InputImageType InputImageType;
00090 
00092   typedef typename Superclass::InputPixelType InputPixelType;
00093 
00095   typedef typename Superclass::RealType RealType;
00096 
00098   itkStaticConstMacro(ImageDimension, unsigned int,Superclass::ImageDimension);
00099 
00101   typedef typename Superclass::IndexType IndexType;
00102 
00104   typedef typename Superclass::ContinuousIndexType ContinuousIndexType;
00105 
00114   virtual OutputType EvaluateAtContinuousIndex(
00115     const ContinuousIndexType & index ) const;
00116 
00117   unsigned int GetContributingNeighbors()
00118   {
00119     return m_Indexes.size();
00120   }
00121 
00122   IndexType GetIndex(unsigned int i)
00123   {
00124     return m_Indexes[i];
00125   }
00126 
00127   double GetOverlap(unsigned int i)
00128   {
00129     return m_Overlaps[i];
00130   }
00131 
00132 
00133 protected:
00134   LinearInterpolateImageFunctionWithWeights();
00135   ~LinearInterpolateImageFunctionWithWeights(){};
00136   void PrintSelf(std::ostream& os, Indent indent) const;
00137 
00138 private:
00139   LinearInterpolateImageFunctionWithWeights( const Self& ); //purposely not implemented
00140   void operator=( const Self& ); //purposely not implemented
00141 
00143   static const unsigned long  m_Neighbors;
00144 
00146   mutable std::vector< IndexType > m_Indexes;
00147 
00149   mutable std::vector< double > m_Overlaps;
00150 
00151 };
00152 
00153 } // end namespace btk
